routes.description: List of calculated vehicle routes based on provided vehicles and visits.

vehicle_name.description: Name of the vehicle assigned to the route
vehicle_name.title: Name

route_index.description: List of depot and visit indices in the route
route_index.title: List of depot and visits index

route_name.description: List of depot and visit names in the route
route_name.title: List of depot and visits name

objective_cost.description: Cost of the route considering objective type, distance, duration, and fixed cost. 0 if the route is empty.
objective_cost.title: Route Cost

distance_cost.description: Distance cost of the route. 0 if the route is empty.
distance_cost.title: Distance Cost

duration_cost.description: Duration cost of the route. 0 if the route is empty.
duration_cost.title: Duration Cost

fixed_cost.description: Fixed cost of the route. 0 if the route is empty.
fixed_cost.title: Fixed Cost

routes.title: Optimized Routes

unassigned_visit_indices.description: List of visit indices that could not be assigned to any route. If all visits are assigned, this list will be empty.
unassigned_visit_indices.title: Unassigned Visit Indices

unassigned_visit_names.description: Names of visits that could not be assigned to any route. If all visits are assigned, this list will be empty.
unassigned_visit_names.title: Unassigned Visit Names

total_objective_cost.description: Aggregated cost of the solution from all routes
total_objective_cost.title: Total Cost

total_distance_cost.description: Sum of the distance cost of the routes in the solution.
total_distance_cost.title: Total Distance Cost

total_duration_cost.description: Sum of the duration cost of the routes in the solution.
total_duration_cost.title: Total Duration Cost

max_distance_cost.description: Maximum distance cost of the routes in the solution.
max_distance_cost.title: Max Distance Cost

max_duration_cost.description: Maximum duration cost of the routes in the solution.
max_duration_cost.title: Max Duration Cost

total_fixed_cost.description: Sum of the fixed cost of the routes in the solution.
total_fixed_cost.title: Total Fixed Cost

unassigned_penalty_cost.description: Sum of penalties for unassigned visits. This value represents the total penalty for visits that could not be assigned to any route. **Note: This cost is *not* included in the objective cost.**
unassigned_penalty_cost.title: Unassigned Penalty Cost

solution_cost_details.title: Total Solution Cost
solution_cost_details.description: Summarized cost information across all calculated routes.

routing_engine_result.title: Engine Result
routing_engine_result.description: Detailed routing solution including routes and costs.

status.title: API Status
status.description: Status of the routing solution (e.g., feasible, infeasible, user_input_error).

detail.description: Explanation of the result status for debugging or understanding the outcome.
detail.title: Status Description

job_id.description: Unique identifier for the routing job. Only needed when contacting Omelet for support.
job_id.title: Job ID
